      • getPKIFailureInfo

        public static org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmp.PKIFailureInfo getPKIFailureInfo​(int failInfo)
        Returns the PKIFailureInfo that is the correct format for CMP, i.e. a DERBitString as specified in PKIFailureInfo.
        Parameters:
        failInfo - info
        Returns:
        PKIFailureInfo for use in CMP error messages
        See Also:
        PKIFailureInfo, FailInfo

      • getHeaderBuilder

      • verifyCertBasedPKIProtection

        public static boolean verifyCertBasedPKIProtection​(org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmp.PKIMessage pKIMessage,
                                                   PublicKey pubKey)
                                            throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                   InvalidKeyException,
                                                   SignatureException
        verifies signature protection on CMP PKI messages
        Parameters:
        pKIMessage - the CMP message to verify signature on, if protected by signature protection
        pubKey - the public key used to verify the signature
        Returns:
        true if verification is ok or false if verification fails
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - message is signed by an unknown algorithm
        InvalidKeyException - pubKey is not valid for signature verification
        SignatureException - if the passed-in signature is improperly encoded or of the wrong type, if this signature algorithm is unable to process the input data provided, etc.

      • protectPKIMessageWithPBE

                                              String macAlgId,
                                              int iterationCount)

                                              InvalidKeyException
        Throws:

      • createUnprotectedErrorMessage

        public static ResponseMessage createUnprotectedErrorMessage​(BaseCmpMessage cmpRequestMessage,
                                                            FailInfo failInfo,
                                                            String failText)
        Creates a very simple error message in response to msg (that's why we switch sender and recipient)
        Parameters:
        cmpRequestMessage - req
        failInfo - info
        failText - text
        Returns:
        response

      • createUnprotectedErrorMessage

        public static byte[] createUnprotectedErrorMessage​(String errorDescription)
        Create a standard unprotected error message with PKIStatus.rejection and PKIFailureInfo.badRequest. The generated message should be sent as a response to an unparsable CMP request only, since the sender nonce is not copied from the client's CMP request and a new transaction ID is generated.
        Parameters:
        errorDescription - error
        Returns:
        The byte representation of the error message

      • createUnprotectedErrorMessage

        public static ResponseMessage createUnprotectedErrorMessage​(org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmp.PKIHeader pkiHeader,
                                                            FailInfo failInfo,
                                                            String failText)
        Create an unsigned RFC 4210 error message as described in section 5.3.21 based on a PKIHeader obtained from a previous CMP client request message.
        Parameters:
        pkiHeader - A PKIHeader extracted from the previous CMP request
        failInfo - An error code describing the type of error
        failText - A human-readable description of the error
        Returns:
        An org.cesecore.certificates.certificate.request.ResponseMessage data structure containing the error

      • createErrorMessage

        public static CmpErrorResponseMessage createErrorMessage​(BaseCmpMessage msg,
                                                         FailInfo failInfo,
                                                         String failText,
                                                         int requestId,
                                                         int requestType,
                                                         CmpPbeVerifyer verifyer,
                                                         String keyId,
                                                         String responseProt)
        creates a simple error message in response to msg. The protection parameters can be null to create an unprotected message
        Parameters:
        msg - msg
        failInfo - info
        failText - text
        requestId - ID
        requestType - type
        verifyer - verifier
        keyId - key
        responseProt - protocol
        Returns:
        IResponseMessage that can be sent to user

        requestType - Type
        Returns:

      • getPkiMessageFromBytes

        public static org.bouncycastle.asn1.cmp.PKIMessage getPkiMessageFromBytes​(byte[] pkiMessageBytes,
                                                                          boolean sanityCheckMaxLevelOfNesting)
        Parameters:
        pkiMessageBytes - bytes
        sanityCheckMaxLevelOfNesting - bool
        Returns:
        the PKIMessage if the bytes can be interpreted as a valid ASN.1 encoded CMP request message or null otherwise
